attacks.name: Club Swing
attacks.special: Targets every Character in Melee range. A Crit knocks a Character Prone if on a 50mm base or less.

attacks.name: Big Foot
attacks.special: Re-roll all failed Hits against Prone targets

attacks.name: Pick Up
attacks.special: May only be used against a Character on a 40mm base or less. On a Crit, the Target Character is Picked Up. They may not move, and if the Giant moves, they are taken with them and reamin in base contact. To escape the target must pass a Medium Feat in their Activation.

traits.name: Long Limbs
traits.description: This Character may Attack Characters in Melee up to 3" away.

traits.name: Bellow
traits.description: Once per Round, on a Medium Feat all enemy Characters within 6" must make a Bravery Test.
